messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] preachers cookies?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I m preggers too and well understand those cravings right about NOW!  If the cookies you re thinking of also incorporate some coconut we call them
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

I'm preggers too and well understand those cravings right about NOW! If
the cookies you're thinking of also incorporate some coconut we call
them "macaroons" and I may be able to help you out...They have milk (you
can even use soy), cocoa, sugar, butter/margarine, vanilla, oatmeal and
the coconut. If this sounds right to you get back to me and I will dig
out the exact measurements.

Sonia

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] preachers cookies?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Angela, I think I know what you re talking about, but I ve always known them as unbaked cookies. Here s my mom s recipe: 2 cups sugar 1/2 cup butter 1/2 cup
messages.messageBody:
Hi Angela,

I think I know what you're talking about, but I've always known them as
unbaked cookies. Here's my mom's recipe:

2 cups sugar
1/2 cup butter
1/2 cup milk

Take from stove and add:
2 cups oatmeal
1 cup coconut
6 T cocoa
1 t vanilla

Drop on waxed paper and let cool.
